config.comment: edm_fast_transform 提供代码转换能力

scripts.build:lx_env: yarn workspace env_def build test1 web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall
scripts.build:edm_env: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall
scripts.build:edm_fast_env: $npm_package_config_edm_fast && $npm_package_config_edm_fast_transform && yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall
scripts.dev:memory: cross-env cacheType=memory NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 gatsby develop -o -S -p 8000 -H su-desktop-web.cowork.netease.com --verbose
scripts.dev:edm_fast: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 FASE_DEV_WEB=true EDM_FAST=true gatsby develop -o -S -p 8000 -H su-desktop-web.cowork.netease.com --verbose
scripts.dev:memory:edm_fast: cross-env cacheType=memory NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 FASE_DEV_WEB=true EDM_FAST=true gatsby develop -o -S -p 8000 -H su-desktop-web.cowork.netease.com --verbose
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 gatsby build --verbose --prefix-paths && yarn afterBuild
scripts.start:edm: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 yarn dev
scripts.start:edm:fast: $npm_package_config_edm_fast && $npm_package_config_edm_fast_transform && yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 EDM_FAST=true yarn dev
scripts.start:edm:fast_init: $npm_package_config_edm_fast_init && $npm_package_config_edm_fast_transform && yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 EDM_FAST=true yarn dev
scripts.build:edm_test: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 yarn buildOnly
scripts.build:edm_test_prod: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test_prod web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 yarn buildOnly
scripts.build:edm_prod: yarn workspace env_def build edm_prod web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 yarn buildOnly
scripts.start:edmmail: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 yarn fastDevEdmMail
scripts.start:fastedm: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 yarn fastDev
scripts.start:fastyingxiao: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=10240 yarn fastDevEdmYingXiao
scripts.start:fastedmdata: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 yarn fastDevEdmData
scripts.start:test: yarn workspace env_def build test web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev
scripts.start:test1: yarn workspace env_def build test1 web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev
scripts.start:test1:fast: $npm_package_config_edm_fast_init && yarn workspace env_def build test1 web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 EDM_FAST=true yarn dev
scripts.start:test2: yarn workspace env_def build test2 web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev:prod
scripts.start: yarn workspace env_def build local web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev
scripts.start:fast: yarn workspace env_def build local web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn fastDev
scripts.start:prev: yarn workspace env_def build prev web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev:prod
scripts.start:prod: yarn workspace env_def build test_prod web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev:prod
scripts.start:edm:prev: yarn workspace env_def build edm_prev web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 yarn dev:prod
scripts.start:edm:prev:fast: $npm_package_config_edm_fast && yarn workspace env_def build edm_prev web && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 EDM_FAST=true yarn dev:prod
scripts.start:electron: yarn workspace env_def build test1 mac && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev
scripts.start:electron:win: yarn workspace env_def build local win && yarn workspace api build && node ./makeInstall && yarn dev
scripts.fastDevEdmData: cross-env FASE_DEV_WEB=true FAST_EDMDATA=true gatsby develop -o -S -p 8000 -H su-desktop-web.cowork.netease.com --verbose
scripts.fastDevEdmMail: cross-env FASE_DEV_WEB=true FAST_EDMMAIL=true gatsby develop -o -S -p 8000 -H su-desktop-web.cowork.netease.com --verbose
scripts.fastDevEdmYingXiao: cross-env FASE_DEV_WEB=true FAST_EDMYINGXIAO=true gatsby develop -o -S -p 8000 -H su-desktop-web.cowork.netease.com --verbose
scripts.afterBuild: node ./build-components/generate-sw.js && yarn workspace api buildBkInitNew && yarn workspace api generateLangJson && node ./makeInstall
scripts.buildElectron: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 BUILD_TARGET=Electron gatsby build --verbose --prefix-paths && node ./build-components/generate-sw.js && yarn workspace api buildBkInitNew && node ./makeInstall
scripts.winBuild: gatsby build --verbose --prefix-paths  && yarn workspace api winBuild:bk_init && node ./makeInstall
scripts.build:app: yarn workspace env_def build test mac && yarn build
scripts.build:web: yarn workspace env_def build test web && yarn workspace api build && yarn build
scripts.build:webmail: yarn workspace env_def build webmail_test web && yarn workspace api build && yarn build
scripts.build:webmail_prod: yarn workspace env_def build webmail_prod web && yarn workspace api build && yarn build
